byline.original: By ERICA GREENE and ADAM MCKAIG

abstract: We’re excited to release the roughly 180,000 labeled ingredient phrases that we used to train the machine learning model we referred to in “Extracting Structured Data From Recipes Using Conditional Random Fields.”

headline.main: Our Tagged Ingredients Data is Now on GitHub

snippet: We’re excited to release the roughly 180,000 labeled ingredient phrases that we used to train the machine learning model we referred to in “Extracting Structured Data From Recipes Using Conditional Random Fields.”
